detaileddescription.para: This is PD Entertainment SP2 Repository These are the rules that you need to follow for committing into this project. #Rule No.1 : Don't use global variables at all cost! #Rule No.2 : Try not to step into each other's work. If needed, ask permission from that person. #Rule No.3 : Use Comic Sans instead of other font types so as to irritate Mr Sim. #Rule No.4 : Solve as many warnings as possible. #Rule No.5 : Document every single one of your codes! #Rule No.6 : Always draw the UML Diagrams necessary for the codes before actual coding so as to prevent messiness #Rule No.7 : Don't let your bugs remain as bugs. JUST FIX THEM!
